data.actual_result: Server emojis stay for multiple channels
data.expected_result: Server emojis should disappear on each channel change, like text does.
data.short_description: Server Emojis typed out (not sent) only disappear after switching channels 2-3 times.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type out local server emojis in a message, but don't send - Switch to 2-3 channels you can type in - Server emojis disappear after the 2nd-3rd channel change
